item.title: Window Covering
item.description: A minimal Window Covering only has a Position. Additionally, Horizontal and Vertical tilt angles can be added, as well as information about Obstruction Detection. Position State is an official characteristic, but does not have any effect! It is implicitly derived by comparing Current State to Target State (e.g. Current State > Target State = Decreasing). When Current State and Target State are not equal, you will get the spinning icon in Home.
